data.lyric:
[ti:Visiting Hours]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Visiting Hours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.46]Visiting Hours - Ed Sheeran
[00:02.72]Composed by：Amy Wadge/Anthony Clemons/Ed Sheeran/Johnny McDaid/Kim Lang Smith/Michael Pollack/Scott Carter
[00:12.38]Produced by：Ed Sheeran/Johnny McDaid
[00:15.09]I wish that heaven had visiting hours
[00:19.97]
[00:21.38]So I could just show up and bring the news
[00:28.07]That she's getting older
[00:29.27]
[00:30.91]I wish that you'd met her
[00:32.74]
[00:34.10]Coz the things that she'll learn from me I got them all from you
[00:40.48]
[00:41.48]Can I just stay a while and we'll put all the world to rights
[00:46.72]
[00:47.82]The little ones will grow and I'll still drink your favourite wine
[00:53.10]
[00:54.07]And soon they're going to close but I'll see you another day
[00:59.89]So much has changed since you been away
[01:07.37]
[01:12.92]I wish that heaven had visiting hours
[01:17.65]
[01:18.91]So I could just swing by and ask your advice
[01:25.51]What would you do in my situation
[01:27.91]
[01:28.57]I haven't a clue how I'd even raise them
[01:31.88]What would you do
[01:33.06]
[01:34.88]Coz you always do what's right
[01:38.11]
[01:39.08]Can we just talk a while until my worries disappear
[01:44.19]
[01:45.36]I'd tell you that I'm scared of turning out a failure
[01:50.47]
[01:51.12]You'd say remember that the answer in the love that we create
[01:57.44]So much has changed since you been away
[02:05.21]
[02:36.11]I wish that heaven had visiting hours
[02:40.43]
[02:42.33]I would ask them if I could take you home
[02:48.64]But I know what they'd say that it's for the best
[02:53.04]
[02:55.08]So I will live life the way you taught me
[02:58.35]And make it on my own
[03:01.11]
[03:02.33]I will close the door but I will open up my heart
[03:07.26]
[03:08.63]And everyone I love will know exactly who you are
[03:13.81]
[03:14.94]'Cause this is not goodbye it is just until we meet again
[03:20.78]So much has changed since you been away
data.trans:
[ti:Visiting Hours]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Visiting Hours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.46]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.72]//
[00:12.38]//
[00:15.09]真希望天堂可以允人探视
[00:19.97]
[00:21.38]这样我可以去看望你 并带去
[00:28.07]我女儿健康成长的好消息
[00:29.27]
[00:30.91]多希望你能见她一面
[00:32.74]
[00:34.10]只因为她从我身上所学的一切 全仰赖亦父亦友的你对我的悉心教授
[00:40.48]
[00:41.48]能否让我驻足片刻 让这没有你的世界重回正轨
[00:46.72]
[00:47.82]孩子终会长大成人 而我依然喝着你所钟爱的红酒
[00:53.10]
[00:54.07]探望时间就要结束了 改天我会再来看你
[00:59.89]自你离开以后 一切已然物是人非
[01:07.37]
[01:12.92]真希望天堂可以允人探视
[01:17.65]
[01:18.91]这样我就可以顺道过来问询你的建议
[01:25.51]若你是我 你会作何选择
[01:27.91]
[01:28.57]那些疑惑该怎么宣之于口 我毫无头绪
[01:31.88]你又会怎么做？
[01:33.06]
[01:34.88]只因在我心底你总能从容不迫做好一切
[01:38.11]
[01:39.08]我们能否聊聊？让我这颗心不再忧虑彷徨
[01:44.19]
[01:45.36]我会坦诚相告 我有多害怕以失败收尾
[01:50.47]
[01:51.12]你会耐心说着：“要记住 一切答案终在爱里”
[01:57.44]自你离开以后 一切已然物是人非
[02:05.21]
[02:36.11]真希望天堂可以允人探视
[02:40.43]
[02:42.33]我会询问 是否可以带你回家
[02:48.64]但我明白答案是 如今已是最好的安排
[02:53.04]
[02:55.08]所以我将遵循你的教导 好好生活
[02:58.35]活出自己的精彩人生
[03:01.11]
[03:02.33]我会关上这扇门 但我会敞开心扉
[03:07.26]
[03:08.63]我爱的每一个人将深知无可替代的你的存在
[03:13.81]
[03:14.94]并非是与你挥手告别 只是将你铭记心底
[03:20.78]自你离开以后 一切已然物是人非
